git flow status¶

Show branch status¶

Synopsis¶

git flow status

Description¶

Show some status about the current branches.

Examples¶

$ git flow status
  develop: 386bc4b
  feature/branch-manager-hooks: cf3e57f
* feature/update-docs: c109555
  master: f8ea3eb

See also¶

git flow(1)

Project Homepage https://github.com/htgoebel/gitflow
